name: Byteshark
description:
Thought lost after its initial discovery 6 years ago, the Byteshark (Carcharodon Digitalis),  a small population of this unique marine animal has been re-discovered alive and well, lurking off the digital coast of the Bit.Trip nation.

Bytesharks are doomed to short, rhythmic lives, reflecting so-called "Beat-Blocks" in order to derive sustance. Failing to return even a mere handful of these can quickly lead to starvation and death for the poor creature!

An incredible living fossil, this XNA-powered creature can only survive in 1280 x 720 resolutions, and will attempt to coerce your monitor to match! Once approached, press "Space" to begin play, and press "Esc" at any time to abandon ship.

-------------------

This game is provided as-is, and will not receive updates.
